What is a workout planner? Workout planner is an application for you to easily create workouts and use them at the gym, without the need for physical training sheets.
Getting started To get started, create your first workout, and add the exercises you want to do in it. After creating some workouts, create a week and assign the workouts created to their respective days, then select the week that will be active in the home menu.
